content: jq cli to parser k8s secrets etc.  1 2 3 4 5 6  kubectl get secrets -n gitlab gitlab-postgresql-password -o json |\ jq -r '.data."postgresql-password"' |base64 --decode kubectl get secrets -n gitlab gitlab-gitlab-initial-root-password -o json |\ jq -r '.data."password"' |base64 --decode
title: JQ usage example
